name: meteor-auth0-lock-landingpage
description: Auth0 lock widget for onescreener landing page.

scripts.sandbox: rm -r -f sandbox && NODE_ENV=sandbox parcel build src/index.js -d sandbox --target browser --no-source-maps
scripts.build: rm -r -f lib && parcel build src/index.js -d lib --target browser --no-source-maps
